definitions.body: lit [[הׂלְכֵי]] [[נְתִיבוֹת]] Ju Jdg 5:6 goers on paths, i.e. travellers, Pr 8:2, Is 58:12 (Oort Lag Klo [[נְתִיחוֹת]] but against this Du); path through sea Is 43:16 (in fig.); of path to house of (personif.) light and darkness Job 38:20.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: = course of life Job 19:8, Job 30:13, La 3:9, Ps 119:105, Ps 142:4, of Isr. Ho 2:8; of path of God's appointment Is 42:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: of moral action, and character: paths of wisdom Pr 3:17, justice Pr 8:20 (‖[[אׂרַח חְדָקָה]]); light Job 24:13; [[עוֹלָם]] ´[[נ]] Je 6:16 (‖[[דֶּרֶח הַטּוֹב]]); path of wicked Pr 1:15, Is 59:8 (crooked), path of adulteress Pr 7:25; [[נְתִיבוֹת]] Je 18:15 is rendered ‘by-paths,’ by Gf Rothst al.; < Gie makes cstr. bef. foll. [[סְלוּלָה דֶּרֶח לאׁ]].—[[נְתִיבָהַ]] Pr 12:28 v. [[נׇתִיב]].
